As a Brand Ambassador, your number one job is to share your love of fashion and do whatever it takes to create an amazing shopping experience for our customers.Our Mission: A store where customers love to shop and employees want to work!Who you are:* Outgoing and excited to meet new people* Positive, charismatic and engaging* Obsessed with fashion and trends* Fantastic sense of style* Thoughtful with a desire to make others feel good about themselves and their individual styleWhat you'll do:* Engage, educate and befriend customers to make an amazing shopping experience* Achieve and exceed sales goals by utilizing our selling strategy* Show understanding of customer's personal style when offering fashion advice* Inspire customers with your knowledge of fashion and trends and help them build perfect outfits* Assist with daily opening and closing tasks to maintain a clean, neat and today store* Complete all job responsibilities such as floorsets, filling the floor, ringing customers, etc. as directed* Remain positive and professional and work together with the team to make a great environment for our customers and each other* Be a role model for our values of respect, integrity, teamwork, compassion and accountabilityWhat you'll need:* Outgoing personality* Love of fashion* Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and multi-task* Flexible availability to meet the needs of the business (including evenings and weekends)* Commitment to arrive for scheduled shifts on time and maintain consistent attendance* Able to meet the physical requirements of the job (standing/walking up to 95% of the time, lifting or moving up to 25 pounds, bend, twist and kneel to complete tasks)Where you come from:* You are at least 16 years of age* Interview Requirement: One group interview (preferred) OR a one-on-one interview with Store ManagerSPARC Group LLC is an equal opportunity employer. We value a culture of inclusion and diversity within our workforce, and are committed to maintaining a workplace free from prohibited employment conduct, including discrimination or harassment on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, age, religion, disability, genetic information, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, marital status, domestic partner status, civil partnership, status as a covered veteran, status in the Uniformed Services of the United States, citizenship and any other characteristic protected by law ("Protected Characteristics").

As a Brand Ambassador, your number one job is to share your love of fashion and do whatever it takes to create an amazing shopping experience for our customers.Our Mission: A store where customers love to shop and employees want to work!Who you are:* Outgoing and excited to meet new people* Positive, charismatic and engaging* Obsessed with fashion and trends* Fantastic sense of style* Thoughtful with a desire to make others feel good about themselves and their individual styleWhat you'll do:* Engage, educate and befriend customers to make an amazing shopping experience* Achieve and exceed sales goals by utilizing our selling strategy* Show understanding of customer's personal style when offering fashion advice* Inspire customers with your knowledge of fashion and trends and help them build perfect outfits* Assist with daily opening and closing tasks to maintain a clean, neat and today store* Complete all job responsibilities such as floorsets, filling the floor, ringing customers, etc. as directed* Remain positive and professional and work together with the team to make a great environment for our customers and each other* Be a role model for our values of respect, integrity, teamwork, compassion and accountabilityWhat you'll need:* Outgoing personality* Love of fashion* Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and multi-task* Flexible availability to meet the needs of the business (including evenings and weekends)* Commitment to arrive for scheduled shifts on time and maintain consistent attendance* Able to meet the physical requirements of the job (standing/walking up to 95% of the time, lifting or moving up to 25 pounds, bend, twist and kneel to complete tasks)Where you come from:* You are at least 16 years of age* Interview Requirement: One group interview (preferred) OR a one-on-one interview with Store ManagerAero OpCo LLC is an equal opportunity employer. We value a culture a culture of inclusion and diversity within our workforce, and are committed to maintaining a workplace free from prohibited employment conduct, including discrimination or harassment on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, age, religion, disability, genetic information, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, marital status, domestic partner status, civil partnership, status as a covered veteran, status in the Uniformed Services of the United States, citizenship and any other characteristic protected by law ("Protected Characteristics").

As a Brand Ambassador, your number one job is to share your love of fashion and do whatever it takes to create an amazing shopping experience for our customers.Our Mission: A store where customers love to shop and employees want to work!Who you are:* Outgoing and excited to meet new people* Positive, charismatic and engaging* Obsessed with fashion and trends* Fantastic sense of style* Thoughtful with a desire to make others feel good about themselves and their individual styleWhat you'll do:* Engage, educate and befriend customers to make an amazing shopping experience* Achieve and exceed sales goals by utilizing our selling strategy* Show understanding of customer's personal style when offering fashion advice* Inspire customers with your knowledge of fashion and trends and help them build perfect outfits* Assist with daily opening and closing tasks to maintain a clean, neat and today store* Complete all job responsibilities such as floorsets, filling the floor, ringing customers, etc. as directed* Remain positive and professional and work together with the team to make a great environment for our customers and each other* Be a role model for our values of respect, integrity, teamwork, compassion and accountabilityWhat you'll need:* Outgoing personality* Love of fashion* Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and multi-task* Flexible availability to meet the needs of the business (including evenings and weekends)* Commitment to arrive for scheduled shifts on time and maintain consistent attendance* Able to meet the physical requirements of the job (standing/walking up to 95% of the time, lifting or moving up to 25 pounds, bend, twist and kneel to complete tasks)Where you come from:* You are at least 16 years of age* Interview Requirement: One group interview (preferred) OR a one-on-one interview with Store ManagerAero OpCo LLC is an equal opportunity employer. We value a culture a culture of inclusion and diversity within our workforce, and are committed to maintaining a workplace free from prohibited employment conduct, including discrimination or harassment on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, age, religion, disability, genetic information, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, marital status, domestic partner status, civil partnership, status as a covered veteran, status in the Uniformed Services of the United States, citizenship and any other characteristic protected by law ("Protected Characteristics").

Job Description: Role of the Brand AmbassadorWe call our Aeropostale team members Brand Ambassadors because they promote the culture, values and mission of Aeropostale. If you are outgoing, friendly and have a passion for fashion, this is a perfect role for you. As a Brand Ambassador, your number one job is to share your love of fashion and do whatever it takes to create an amazing shopping experience for our customers.Our Mission: A store where customers love to shop and employees want to work!Who you are:* Outgoing and excited to meet new people* Positive, charismatic and engaging* Obsessed with fashion and trends* Fantastic sense of style* Thoughtful with a desire to make others feel good about themselves and their individual styleWhat you'll do:* Engage, educate and befriend customers to make an amazing shopping experience* Achieve and exceed sales goals by utilizing our selling strategy* Show understanding of customer's personal style when offering fashion advice* Inspire customers with your knowledge of fashion and trends and help them build perfect outfits* Assist with daily opening and closing tasks to maintain a clean, neat and today store* Complete all job responsibilities such as floorsets, filling the floor, ringing customers, etc. as directed* Remain positive and professional and work together with the team to make a great environment for our customers and each other* Be a role model for our values of respect, integrity, teamwork, compassion and accountabilityWhat you'll need:* Outgoing personality* Love of fashion* Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and multi-task* Flexible availability to meet the needs of the business (including evenings and weekends)* Commitment to arrive for scheduled shifts on time and maintain consistent attendance* Able to meet the physical requirements of the job (standing/walking up to 95% of the time, lifting or moving up to 25 pounds, bend, twist and kneel to complete tasks)Where you come from:* You are at least 16 years of age* Interview Requirement: One group interview (preferred) OR a one-on-one interview with Store ManagerAero OpCo LLC is an equal opportunity employer. We value a culture a culture of inclusion and diversity within our workforce, and are committed to maintaining a workplace free from prohibited employment conduct, including discrimination or harassment on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, age, religion, disability, genetic information, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, marital status, domestic partner status, civil partnership, status as a covered veteran, status in the Uniformed Services of the United States, citizenship and any other characteristic protected by law ("Protected Characteristics").

Job Title: FT Brand Ambassador and Sales Representative- Weekly Pay
Job Description:
Job Description
Are you looking for more than just a job? Are you serious about starting a fantastic career path and work with a team that’s dedicated to helping you reach your goals?

Here at Pulse, we work together as a unit to help everyone achieve their personal and professional goals. We believe that when people enjoy what they do, they naturally perform at higher levels. We are here to train and develop the future leaders of tomorrow. We offer a top-notch training program in sales, marketing, management, and leadership development. We are not your standard 9 – 5ers. You will not find any cubicles in our office.

Why work with Pulse?
We are committed to our people – when you succeed, we succeed.
We deliver results and exceed expectations for our clients, unlike any other vendor.
Our company culture is one of a kind – fun, energetic and family-oriented
Our proven systems and new partnerships enable us to make strides to stay ahead of the competition.
We only promote from within - we offer rapid promotions for top performers.
Job Responsibilities for Brand Ambassador and Sales Representative:
Be the face of our clients by creating a long-lasting first impression
Meet and exceed sales goals and standards of performance
Provide a fun, full-service buying experience to customers
Stay up to date on the latest technology trends
Maintain store appearance and compliance
Walk customers through sales presentations
Address customer questions and maintain high customer retention quality
Requirements:

We believe the amount of success that someone achieves is directly proportional to the effort they put into it.
Prior sales, marketing, customer service, retail or experience working with the general public is preferred but not mandatory
Excellent interpersonal skills and customer service skills
Ability to follow our hands-on, in-house, and classroom training model to be successful
Apply today for immediate consideration.
Company Description
With aggressive growth, expansion plans, and ambitious goals, Pulse Marketing Group leads the south in strategic thinking and execution. We're looking for dedicated talent to join our motivated team. Comprised of problem solvers and strategic thinkers; we work united in the direction of common goals. At Pulse Marketing Group commitment to teamwork helps us to accomplish every goal set. If you're interested in joining an all-star team, please submit your resume. We are conducting interviews this week, so you will be contacted soon if you qualify. Local candidates only as we are looking to fill this position as quickly as possible. We require in-person Interviews.

Job Title: Brand Ambassador (Westfield Malls) - Siesta Key & Sarasota Sq
Job Description:
Job Summary:

We are seeking high energy sales talent to represent a Westfield branded Kiosks across the country. Ideal candidates will engage the consumer, promote & drive sales, inspire, and spark interest with product knowledge in each location. You will also be answering questions on a smart device through our proprietary app.

We are staffing the Kiosk’s 7 days a week with (2) shifts (11am-3pm & 3pm-7pm). Support at your local Westfield may start as soon as June 6th and is projected to last 8 weeks. A branded mask and shirt will be provided to all talent supporting this project.

Your Role:
Represent Westfield to promote and sell the safety, features and benefits of Masks and Key
Become knowledgeable about the mask & key products displayed, answering consumer questions, and SELLING!
Share with customers this is a Westfield Charity hosted event and all proceeds will be donated to a great cause
Capture consumer contact information via tablet
Proactively communicate successes and opportunities
Opening & Closing of kiosk
Company Description:

Winston Retail is the leading service agency that provides demo and retail merchandising support, environmental design, and project management. Our national team of merchandise coordinators are passionate, talented and hard-working. They are responsible for retail presentations for technology, image & lifestyle fashion brands. We specialize in apparel, footwear and accessories, and are expanding our footprint into technology with a variety of retailers. For additional company information, please visit our website: www.winstonretail.com.

Experience & Skill Requirements:
2-3 years of sales experience in a retail environment
Strong presentations skills & selling acumen
Experience with special events and ability to handle a fast-paced environment
Engaging personality with a passion for Health & Wellness (preferred)
Negotiating & influencing skills
Proficient computer skills
Required Skills & Tools:
Communicates timely and effectively (both verbal and written)
Intermediate to advanced computer knowledge (Excel, Word, email and digital photography)
Proficient in capturing crisp, clear mirror image photography (before and after photos showcasing completed work)
Ability to lift at least 25 pounds
Smartphone device for reporting purposes -- Android OS 8.0 or higher/Apple iOS 8.0 or higher
Must know how to download and install an app on your smart phone
Must have the ability to upload a report, which includes multiple photos, to our reporting site via the app
Must be able to keep phone OS up to date
Must know how to use wi-fi services

Job Title: Brand Ambassador Sales Executive Berglund Ford GMC Buick

Job Description
We have a unique opportunity for the right person! Is this you? Have you been told you could sell anything to anyone before? Do you enjoy meeting new people? Do you like helping others? If you answered YES to all of the above questions, we would like to speak with you!

This could be a life changing position for the right person! Are you that person?

Job Title: Brand Ambassador - Aeropostale Moreno Valley Mall
Job Description: Role of the Brand AmbassadorWe call our Aeropostale team members Brand Ambassadors because they promote the culture, values and mission of Aeropostale. If you are outgoing, friendly and have a passion for fashion, this is a perfect role for you. As a Brand Ambassador, your number one job is to share your love of fashion and do whatever it takes to create an amazing shopping experience for our customers.Our Mission: A store where customers love to shop and employees want to work!Who you are:* Outgoing and excited to meet new people* Positive, charismatic and engaging* Obsessed with fashion and trends* Fantastic sense of style* Thoughtful with a desire to make others feel good about themselves and their individual styleWhat you'll do:* Engage, educate and befriend customers to make an amazing shopping experience* Achieve and exceed sales goals by utilizing our selling strategy* Show understanding of customer's personal style when offering fashion advice* Inspire customers with your knowledge of fashion and trends and help them build perfect outfits* Assist with daily opening and closing tasks to maintain a clean, neat and today store* Complete all job responsibilities such as floorsets, filling the floor, ringing customers, etc. as directed* Remain positive and professional and work together with the team to make a great environment for our customers and each other* Be a role model for our values of respect, integrity, teamwork, compassion and accountabilityWhat you'll need:* Outgoing personality* Love of fashion* Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and multi-task* Flexible availability to meet the needs of the business (including evenings and weekends)* Commitment to arrive for scheduled shifts on time and maintain consistent attendance* Able to meet the physical requirements of the job (standing/walking up to 95% of the time, lifting or moving up to 25 pounds, bend, twist and kneel to complete tasks)Where you come from:* You are at least 16 years of age* Interview Requirement: One group interview (preferred) OR a one-on-one interview with Store ManagerAero OpCo LLC is an equal opportunity employer. RENEWAL BY ANDERSEN OF GREATER PHILLY "2019 TOP WORKPLACES AWARD"!We are the largest window manufacturer in North America and still growing rapidly. We are looking for well-spoken, energetic and eager individuals who want to learn new skills or start a career with unlimited opportunities on a part-time basis.This challenging and fun job takes place at different retail locations throughout the Greater Philly area. You will communicate with people at onsite retail store locations and farmers markets to generate leads.Watch this one-minute video to learn more about being a Brand Ambassador: CLICK HEREAbout the role* High performing teammates have the drive and desire to make $$$* You will work for a team that values honesty, transparency and FUN!!* Part-time hours will include daytime and evening hours mainly on Saturday and Sunday (weekday hours a plus)!!* Average Brand Ambassadors are making $25-$30 per hour (hourly plus commission)As a lead generation position, this position requires the ability to have conversations with ease, overcome objections and keep a positive attitude. A very independent position, Marketing Representatives travel to and from events with setup items, so reliable transportation is required. Mileage reimbursement is provided!THE RENEWAL BY ANDERSEN | ESLER COMPANIES STORYRenewal by Andersen is the full-service window-replacement division of 115-year-old Andersen Corporation, the owner of the most trusted family of window brands in America. RbA was founded with a mission to redefine the industry and to offer a different-and better-window-replacement experience. Renewal by Andersen has seven company-owned locations, and over 100 independently owned "affiliates" across the United States.The Esler Companies is the holding company for a fleet of the top Renewal by Andersen (RbA) "affiliates" in Greater Philadelphia, Colorado, Greater Phoenix, and Southern New England, and a sales and marketing 'engine' in Northborough, Massachusetts. Independent affiliates operate with a business model which grants owners exclusive marketing and sales territories, and nearly complete autonomy in running their businesses.Esler Companies | Renewal by Andersen is a proud equal opportunity employer. We are committed to fair hiring practices and to creating a welcoming environment for all team members.Take a look at life at Esler Companies | Renewal by Andersen at www.esler.comCopy this link into your browser and watch our video for more information:CLICK HERE

Brand Evangelist Summary

Lakanto, one of the fastest growing Natural Food Companies, is looking for upbeat individuals to join our Team. Lakanto Brand Evangelists are heavily relied on to drive sales and bring the brand to life. You will actively educate on the benefits of Lakanto MonkFruit Sweetened products and create positive brand experiences.

If you are a resourceful and reliable self-starter who loves engaging with people then this is the job for you! This is a field-based, contract-based role that will be ever-changing and exciting.

Position Responsibilities:
Grass roots promoters
Well connected and charismatic
Expert in a related brand or field
Not a must have to have social followings
You will be a spokesperson for Lakanto
We want you to wear your ambassadorship loudly and proudly across all channels
Attend and/or help run events
Position Requirements:
Passion for Lakanto
Previous Ambassador, influencer, or affiliate experience preferred
Excited about life and health!
An itch to help spread the "Discover your Chi" movement!
Lakanto Summary

Lakanto is a fast-paced company that is a subsidiary of Saraya Worldwide, a Fortune 500 company in Japan.

We are a startup that is looking for people that are hungry and eager to build and grow. We are looking for people that are passionate, driven, clever, and can resonate with our core values.

Our Core Values
Focused Discipline
Speed is the New Currency
Do More with Less
Master Sherpas Needed
Be Agile & Adaptable
80/20 Rule
We Over-Communicate
We Innovate
Create a Movement
Be the Category King
Mission

Our mission is to bring Chi to Life. We do this by inspiring people to reach their highest

potential in health and wellness and creating products that are innovative, delicious,

natural, sugar-free, and healthy.

THE PERKS AND BENEFITS
Free Product
Lakanto Swag
Working with an awesome team

Brand Ambassador (Event & Show Demonstrator)

With more than 25 years in business, 1 Day Bath Arizona is one of the fastest growing brands in the acrylic bath remodeling industry. We offer custom bath remodeling that enriches the lives of those we touch with bathrooms that are attractive, durable and maintenance-free.

We are seeking Brand Ambassadors/Event Demonstrators for our Mesa, AZ markets and surrounding areas to join our winning team. Customer service experience is a plus, as you will be interacting with event attendees, discussing our product and securing sales leads for our team. Hourly pay + additional bonuses based on quality appointments.

Essential Duties
Attract visitors and staff booth at shows and events
Promote product and provide basic product overviews to attendees
Book appointments
Specific Responsibilities of the Job
Maintain a professional appearance throughout event
Ensure cleanliness and organization of booth
Engage with passers-by to draw them into the booth
Explain basic product features and benefits
Secure entry forms or book in home sales appointments
Collect daily leads and provide to Event Coordinator
Knowledge & Skill
Strong communications skills
Positive, outgoing personality
Ability to work in a fast-paced environment
Physical Demands
Travel to booked shows/events (must have reliable transportation)
Ability to stand for long periods of time
Ability to lift 30 pounds
Available to work weekends

We are seeking a professional, reliable, enthusiastic brand ambassador to join our growing company. In this role, you will serve as the face and voice of our company, build brand recognition, and successfully promote our products and services. You will communicate and engage with customers, both online and offline, in meaningful ways to increase our company’s brand awareness and add generate new sales opportunities. Perform a variety of positions including:

Job Title: Brand Ambassador - Sales / Marketing / Brand Representative
Job Description:
Job Description
The Opening:
As a Brand Ambassador - Sales and Marketing at our agency, you would be responsible for driving revenue and assisting with new business and campaign development. In addition to representing some of the most well-known and largest clients in the industry, top representatives assist with new campaign pilots and client meetings.

Training is provided for this role!

Once acclimated into the role, additional responsibilities may include:
Mentoring others
Developing and teaching effective sales strategies
Tracking industry trends/competition
Conducting corporate training classes
Field training/shadowing
Performance evaluating and coaching
Top reasons to work with our agency:
Longevity and security. With over 15 years in business and a national network of 30 offices, we offer opportunities in a variety of industries with tremendous growth potential.
Internal upward mobility. As your career progresses, you'll have the opportunity to seek management positions and consulting levels. With different divisions, your career prospects can expand with the company.
Our core values have not changed. Our motto is "Do the right thing, even when no one is looking." We have long been acknowledged for our commitment to excellence.
A commitment to diversity. As a leader in the business community, we are committed to diversity in every aspect of our hiring policies and understand that individual differences make our company strong. Whether you have experience and are changing careers or a recent college graduate - We empower our team to make decisions and encourage creativity.
A reputation for excellence. We have recognized nationally as one of the BEST and BRIGHTEST COMPANIES TO WORK FOR.
Job Requirements
2-3 years of experience in retail, hospitality, sales, or marketing
BA/BS preferred but not required with experience in hospitality and/or leadership
Ability to quickly learn through corporate classroom-style training and hands-on field training
Proven track record of effective leadership
Some training or management experience preferred
Confidence and effective communication skills (i.e., a “people person")
Professional image
Strong verbal / written communication
Negotiation and presentation skills

Company Description
Here at Jonathan Wesley Inc, we’re on a mission to help companies in the Chicagoland area market their brand through innovated strategies involving trade-shows, local events, retail partners, and many more mediums! JW works with a diverse portfolio of some of the largest corporations in the U.S. Whatever sales or marketing need they may have, Jonathan Wesley is there with our powerful sales team, executing new campaigns, having fun, and loving who we're doing it with!

We build opportunities in every direction for our people!

This means the chance to be a part of creating, selling and marketing products. Growing a long-term career and obtaining great resume building skills. We are offering full-time. part-time, and internship opportunities as our peak season approaches.

Ours is a culture where you’re empowered to be amazing at work and life. To explore new opportunities, to be mentored by great leaders, and enjoy coming to work every day is what our company is built upon.

Join us to be part of a company where you can learn, thrive and make a difference.

Job Description
CUSTOMER SERVICE OR SALES EXPERIENCE WANTED!

ENTRY LEVEL Brand Ambassador

Please submit your resume by clicking the APPLY NOW button.

Kelly Global Consultants is currently hiring entry level individuals with a customer service & sales background for the Brand Ambassador position. We have found that candidates working in a retail, restaurant, hospitality, sales or customer service positions are very easy to train for our Brand Ambassador position. We specialize in areas of customer renewal, customer, and retention, and customer acquisition. This position involves one on one sales based interaction with customers.

Our sales and marketing firm is the leader in the industry and in tailoring customer service & sales to their needs. Our client wants us to deliver a face to face customer service experience. We do this by taking care of the existing customer base and providing personal care with new customers.

Representing the third largest telecommunication company in the world, it is a priority for our team to provide the best customer service, professionalism, and to build land and maintain quality customer relationship.

Due to expansion, we are willing to train highly motivated people for management and customer service & sales opportunities but you must be willing to work hard in an entry level customer service, sales, and marketing position. All openings are ideal for recent graduates, or professionals with customer service & sales experience looking for a career change because this is an entry-level position in a brand new industry.

Advancement and compensation are based on individual performance.

FREEBEE COMPANY OVERVIEW:

Freebee is changing the way people move around, by providing FREE, electric, on-demand, door-to-door transportation in several high-density areas of South Florida. That's right! FREE RIDES in 100% battery-powered vehicles, made possible through customized mobile advertising campaigns and municipal transportation contacts... and we are pollinating the masses with our many services in a progressive and sustainable way!

At Freebee, we know how to live it up! Our drivers are fun, energetic, and knowledgeable about the cities we call home, and can't wait to spread the word about what's going on around town, and all the great products and businesses we are currently promoting. Join one of South Florida's fastest growing companies and sign up to become part of our team of creative, driven, and passionate professionals who live and breathe the FREE LIFE!

JOB TITLE:

DRIVER / BRAND AMBASSADOR (ISLAMORADA, FL)

POSITION OVERVIEW:

The Freebee Driver / Brand Ambassador position is one of the most important positions in our company. You are the face of the organization, and the one interacting most with the general public, educating them on our services and everything we have to offer. Shaking hands, kissing babies, and spreading goodwill to all.

We are seeking sharp, personable, highly-organized brand ambassadors to provide safe, reliable transportation to the general public, as well as provide them with valuable information about the latest and greatest happenings around town. The experience you provide for your guests will generate future opportunities for yourself, for our clients, and for the Freebee brand.

As part of the South Florida team, your role will be instrumental in spreading the word about our innovative free, on-demand transportation service, which will allow us to grow our fleet and take on new opportunities throughout South Florida and beyond. This is an opportunity to be a key player on an awesome team, as we continue to expand and enhance the reputation of the Freebee service as a whole.

WHAT YOU'LL DO:

- Provide safe, professional, and efficient transportation via open-air, electric marketing vehicles

- Interact with and provide great customer service to all passengers

- Create a fun environment and represent the company in a positive way

- Promote brands, distribute marketing material / branded collateral / product samples

- Document marketing experiences by taking photos

WHAT YOU NEED TO KNOW/HAVE:

- CLEAN DRIVING RECORD (will be reviewed prior to hire)

- Valid Florida drivers license

- Energetic, outgoing personality

- Well-groomed appearance

- Effective time management / punctuality

- Communication skills (verbal & written)

- Must own a smart phone

- Knowledge of how to get around one or more of our service areas (see below for specific service areas)

- Bilingual is a PLUS! +

EXAMPLE BACKGROUNDS:

- Hospitality

- Customer Service

- Communications

- Brand Activation / Events

- Marketing

PERKS:

- Health insurance Benefits Provided!

- Have Fun & Work Outside!

- Meet New People!

- Career Advancement Opportunities Available!

- The rare opportunity to change the world such that everyone around you is using the product that you promote. We’re not just another service; we’re moving real people, reinventing marketing, and providing a reliable, eco-friendly alternative to transportation!

AVAILABILITY:

- Flexible Hours!

- Islamorada, FL operating hours:

[Thursday-Friday: 4pm-12am; Saturday: 12pm-12am; Sunday: 11am-8pm]

- Freebee operates seven (7) days a week, operating between the hours of 6:00am - 2:00am

- Now hiring full-time & part-time employees in over fifteen (15) different service areas

SERVICE AREAS:

- Islamorada, FL

- Palmetto Bay, FL

- Pinecrest, FL

- Coral Gables, FL

- Coconut Grove, FL

- Key Biscayne, FL

- Miami, FL: [Wynwood, Downtown, Design District, Midtown, Edgewater, Brickell]

- South Beach, FL

- Mid-Beach (Miami Beach), FL

- North Bay Village, FL

- Doral, FL

- Miami Lakes, FL

- Delray Beach, FL

We're looking for great people to join our team! If asked to describe yourself and “fun,” "outgoing," and "self-dependent" come to mind, chances are you'll be a great fit for our team. Interested? APPLY NOW!!

FREEBEE COMPANY OVERVIEW:

Freebee is changing the way people move around, by providing FREE, electric, on-demand, door-to-door transportation in several high-density areas of South Florida. That's right! FREE RIDES in 100% battery-powered vehicles, made possible through customized mobile advertising campaigns and municipal transportation contacts... and we are pollinating the masses with our many services in a progressive and sustainable way!

At Freebee, we know how to live it up! Our drivers are fun, energetic, and knowledgeable about the cities we call home, and can't wait to spread the word about what's going on around town, and all the great products and businesses we are currently promoting. Join one of South Florida's fastest growing companies and sign up to become part of our team of creative, driven, and passionate professionals who live and breathe the FREE LIFE!

JOB TITLE:

DRIVER / BRAND AMBASSADOR (FORT LAUDERDALE, FL)

POSITION OVERVIEW:

The Freebee Driver / Brand Ambassador position is one of the most important positions in our company. You are the face of the organization, and the one interacting most with the general public, educating them on our services and everything we have to offer. Shaking hands, kissing babies, and spreading goodwill to all.

We are seeking sharp, personable, highly-organized brand ambassadors to provide safe, reliable transportation to the general public, as well as provide them with valuable information about the latest and greatest happenings around town. The experience you provide for your guests will generate future opportunities for yourself, for our clients, and for the Freebee brand.

As part of the South Florida team, your role will be instrumental in spreading the word about our innovative free, on-demand transportation service, which will allow us to grow our fleet and take on new opportunities throughout South Florida and beyond. This is an opportunity to be a key player on an awesome team, as we continue to expand and enhance the reputation of the Freebee service as a whole.

WHAT YOU'LL DO:

- Provide safe, professional, and efficient transportation via open-air, electric marketing vehicles

- Interact with and provide great customer service to all passengers

- Create a fun environment and represent the company in a positive way

- Promote brands, distribute marketing material / branded collateral / product samples

- Document marketing experiences by taking photos

WHAT YOU NEED TO KNOW/HAVE:

- CLEAN DRIVING RECORD (will be reviewed prior to hire)

- Valid Florida drivers license

- Energetic, outgoing personality

- Well-groomed appearance

- Effective time management / punctuality

- Communication skills (verbal & written)

- Must own a smart phone

- Knowledge of how to get around one or more of our service areas (see below for specific service areas)

- Bilingual is a PLUS! +

EXAMPLE BACKGROUNDS:

- Hospitality

- Customer Service

- Communications

- Brand Activation / Events

- Marketing

PERKS:

- Health insurance Benefits Provided!

- Have Fun & Work Outside!

- Meet New People!

- Career Advancement Opportunities Available!

- The rare opportunity to change the world such that everyone around you is using the product that you promote. We’re not just another service; we’re moving real people, reinventing marketing, and providing a reliable, eco-friendly alternative to transportation!

AVAILABILITY:

- Flexible Hours!

- Fort Lauderdale, FL operating hours:

[Monday-Thursday: 10am-8pm; Friday: 12pm-11pm; Saturday: 12pm-11pm; Sunday: 10am-4pm]

- Freebee operates seven (7) days a week, operating between the hours of 6:00am - 2:00am

- Now hiring full-time & part-time employees in over thirteen (13) different service areas

SERVICE AREAS:

- Fort Lauderdale, FL

- Delray Beach, FL

- Miami Lakes, FL

- Hallandale Beach, FL

- Doral, FL

- Key Biscayne, FL

- Miami, FL: [Wynwood, Downtown, Design District, Midtown, Edgewater, Brickell]

- Miami Beach, FL

- Coral Gables, FL

- Coconut Grove, FL

- Pinecrest, FL

- Palmetto Bay, FL

- Islamorada, FL

Job Title: Brand Ambassador - Sales Position Starting at $14+ an hour
Job Description:
Position: Brand Ambassador - Sales Position Starting at $14+ an hour

Location: Big City Car Wash
Store Address: 1785 Wells Road, Orange Park, FL 32073
Job Id: 415
Number of Openings: 3-4

Job Description:

Make Customers Feel Welcome while working with a Sense of Urgency. Take Personal Pride in Everything we do.

Our Brand Ambassador position responsibilities include:
Welcoming members back on property
Scanning in memberships and directing traffic into the tunnel
Problem solving skills
Here are some of the benefits of working with us:
Flexible Hours. We understand life and will schedule you around it. Requires 24 hours per week and work a shift Saturday or Sunday.
Competitive Pay. Your hard work is rewarded. Our Brand Ambassadors make $14 per hour as a starting wage and $15 an hour after 90 days.
Incentives. You'll have opportunities to earn monthly incentives and prizes.
College Tuition Assistance. We give up to $2,500 each year.
A fun, professional, outdoor work environment. Our car wash is a nurturing environment where you will learn valuable business and people skills.
Career advancement opportunities. Half of our current management team started in hourly roles such as this.
No Experience Is Necessary. We are looking for friendly, enthusiastic people who enjoy serving customers. We will teach you everything else you need to know.
We are an equal opportunity employer.

Overview


Since 1848, Morton Salt has been improving lives and enhancing every day moments. We not only offer your favorite salts for the kitchen but have also created water-softening salts for your home, ice melt salts for your walkways, and chemical-free salts for your pool. Morton Salt also produces quality salts for a vast array of industries, from food manufacturing to pharmaceuticals.

We are widely recognized for our famous Morton Salt Girl, one of America’s most beloved icons. She has been the face of our brand for over a century and remains a symbol of trust for consumers and customers.

The Culinary portfolio includes Morton Salt’s iconic “Blue Round Can” in the US, Windsor Salt’s iconic “Rectangle” in Canada, and a full range of fast growing salts including Kosher and Sea Salt. Our Seasonings, featuring Season-All and Nature’s Seasons, are also a part of this segment. Given its broad household penetration, the Culinary portfolio also plays a lead role in the overall branding efforts for Morton and Windsor as a whole.

Position Purpose

The Senior Assistant Brand Manager is a general management role with P&L responsibility. This person has shared accountability for managing the short-term and long-term profitability of the Culinary business in the US and direct accountability in Canada.

Activities will include the following:

Leads the strategic marketing planning processes for the Canadian Culinary business and supports the process for the US, identifying and driving key initiatives to advance the businessLeads the research, development, positioning and commercialization of new products, line extensions, visual graphics, and enhanced product offerings across all channels for innovation projects close to the base businessIn collaboration with the communications team, the Senior Assistant Brand Manager will develop, execute, and measure the advertising and promotion strategy to drive sales and brand equity for the portfolio. Establish and report against key performance metrics, addressing any gaps to budget and future commitments.

Responsibilities


1. P&L Ownership

Directly accountable for the Canadian Culinary P&L and supports the management of the US P&LResponsible for managing against a business scorecard and reporting to the Executive Team issues and opportunities to improve performanceLeads a cross functional P&L Team to track, forecast, analyze and identify sources to improve P&L and business performance

2. Business Strategy & Execution

Responsible for establishing and gaining alignment from the Executive Team on strategies and plans to improve profitability and achieve desired business and market objectives in CanadaLeads key initiatives in the US to strengthen competitive position and drive category growth Aligns resources and leads the cross-functional team to execute against strategies and tacticsManages performance and works closely with cross-functional partners to overcome barriers in order to achieve desired business goalsUtilizes syndicated data, and competitive intelligence to assess market opportunities. Uses quantitative and qualitative research to vet new product ideas, packaging, pricing, and positioning strategies

3. Business Development

Closely monitors and identifies changes in market, customer and competitor trends with the potential for impacting current and future business performanceIdentifies market opportunities and risks, quantifies/estimates P&L impact, and justifies investments required to support future business growthImplements all assigned commercialization efforts to ensure the organization delivers against its growth commitments and portfolio expansion initiativesEstablishes and reports against key performance metrics, addressing any gaps to budget and future commitmentsProvides input with Supply Chain & Operations to incorporate market requirements into short and long-term capacity planning

4. Build and Protect Long-Term Brand Equity

Uses customer and consumer/end-user insights to drive business and brand activity, new products, strategies, and thought leadershipContributes to the development of clear brand vision, positioning, promise, goals and strategy Works with Communications and Sales Strategy & Planning teams to create communication vehicles and sales tools that convey brand value and justify selling price premium Measures performance and implements improvement measures to achieve desired customer and consumer experience

5. Innovation and Product Portfolio Management

Provides input to the Innovation team for the development and execution of product and packaging innovation plans to support portfolio growth. Responsible for go-to-market planning and execution for all types of innovation projects from “sustaining” to “transformational” innovationOversees all stages of sustaining innovation projects – from idea generation through commercializationManages the Canadian Culinary product portfolio, investment levels and associated consumer communications (in partnership with the Communication Team) in accordance with the portfolio strategy, stage in the product life cycle, and segment objectives

6. Pricing Strategy Development, Planning & Performance

Provides strategic direction and collaborates with the pricing team to develop and optimize pricing architectures, strategies and plans by product lines in the Canada Culinary category Integrates pricing strategies and plans into product strategies and plansPartners with Brand Finance and the Sales Strategy & Planning teams to forecast and track the impact of pricing actions with regards to overall business and financial performanceCollaborates with Sales Strategy & Planning and Sales teams to identify optimal trade promotions to delivery business results.

7. Budgeting & Forecasting

Participant in monthly integrated business planning meetings, providing key market drivers that will impact the forecast and ensuring new business opportunities and risks are incorporated into the demand planReviews baseline budget and financial forecast development and recommends adjustments to estimated sales volume and revenue attainment based on key growth initiatives, market growth rates, trends, opportunities and risks

Qualifications


Minimum Position Qualifications

Education: Bachelor’s degree required

Experience: Minimum of 5 years of experience, with 2+ years in consumer marketing preferably in CPG

Knowledge, Skills and Abilities

Well-rounded business acumen with proven skills in marketing, business strategy, and general managementPassion for inspiring customers as well as external and internal partnersExperience successfully launching new products and managing the product life cycle a plusProven track record of success and demonstrated ability in leading cross functional teamsMust be enthusiastic, self-motivated and demonstrate excellent problem solving and decision-making skills.Proven ability to think and move between strategic and analytical thinking as well as actual executionExperience with Nielsen and/or IRI strongly preferredMust be well organized, able to work under time constraints and multi-task in a fast-paced environment, meeting deadlines as set by managerSAP experience a plus

Travel

10%

*CB

*GLDR

Job Title: Brand Ambassador - Entry Level - Immediate Hire!
Job Description:
Job Description
ALPHA BUSINESS ACQUISITIONS WAS NAMED ONE OF KENTUCKY'S BEST PLACES TO WORK 2 YEARS IN A ROW!

As an Entry-Level Brand Ambassador at Alpha Business Acquisitions, Inc. your primary focus is to build relationships with customers to ensure loyalty and expand the customer base. You are critical to ensuring our customer's experience is an exceptional one.

Our Entry-Level Brand Ambassadors know what our customers want and deliver it. We hear and sense customer needs and keep our fellow team members informed. We take pride in every aspect of our work and perform it with energy and enthusiasm. We are strong team players with a commitment to continuous learning. We provide quality service and products to our customers. The position involves daily one on one sales based interaction with customers.

Requirements:
Full-time availability (part-time can be discussed)
Enjoy meetings and interacting with customers
Demonstrates a positive and professional demeanor
Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and handle multiple priorities
A team player who possesses the ability to work effectively with customers, co-workers, and management.
Skills:
Critical thinking skills to assess and resolve customer needs quickly and consistently
Active listening skills and effective communication strategies
How to recognize and defuse difficult customer behavior
Perks of Working at Alpha Business Acquisitions:
Paid Training
National and international travel incentives
Medical benefits
Profit-sharing
Uncapped commission and bonus potential
SEP Profit Sharing
Potential stock ownership
Persons with Experience in the following areas should apply:

Business development manager, customer relationship manager, restaurant, retail, full time, part time, entry level accounting, full time administrative assistant, receptionist, warehouse manager, retail associate, retail cashier, management, office assistant, office, clerical, office manager, insurance, customer service representative, leadership, operations manager, store manager, supervisor, director, teacher, project manager, communications, retail salesperson, customer service, marketing manager, marketing, territory manager, sales administrator, full time marketing executive, e-business, distribution manager, customer service clerk, call center agent, customer service director, customer service sales, field sales representative, account manager, advertising director, area sales manager, communications manager, full time communications director, media relations, public relations, e-commerce, sales, inside sales, outside sales, direct sales, insurance sales, executive administrative assistant, sports director, sports league official, business systems analyst, assistant manager, office support worker, admin support worker, human resources, full time recruiter, entry level recruiter, real estate, real estate agent, property management, training, develop, development, host, hostess, waitress, waiter, full time prep cook, restaurant manager
Company Description
We are executing new and innovative strategies to satisfy our client's demand by providing quality customers through unique buying experiences. It's simple, as a Sales and Marketing Company. We specialize in RETAIL BUSINESS DEVELOPMENT and new customer acquisitions for our clients.

Founded in 2015, we are one of the fastest growing companies in the outsourced sales industry, and our consistent growth continues to provide an opportunity to hundreds of individuals looking for an ambitious career path in business management.

Our values:
Deliver WOW Through Service
Embrace and Drive Change
Create Fun and a Little Weirdness
Be Adventurous, Creative, and Open-Minded
Pursue Growth and Learning
Build Open and Honest Relationships with Communication
Build a Positive Team and Family Spirit
Do More with Less
Be Passionate and Determined
Be Humble

Company Industry: Food And Beverage
Opportunity: The Mom Project is helping to source candidates for the above client who is looking for an Associate Brand Manager, Innovation
Commitment Level: 40 hours per week, on-site, 80% remote, contract through July 2020

Position Summary
Reporting to the Marketing Innovation Manager, this Associate Marketing Innovation Manager will work with multi-disciplinary partners, including Innovation, Consumer Insights, and Brand Marketing, to develop innovation and pipeline strategies, identify and assess new product and packaging innovation opportunities, and lead a cross-functional team to bring ideas to market

Responsibilities
Discover
• Develop and use ongoing analysis of category, competitive, and consumer trends to uncover areas of opportunity and unmet consumer needs to fuel innovative ideas across consumers, channels and markets
• Use business intelligence, syndicated data and insights to estimate market size and potential
• Work closely with the Marketing Innovation Manager to develop smart, inspiring, consumer-focused, and insight-driven briefs to engage agency partners
• Participate in brainstorming sessions for white space identification and concept/proposition development
• Work closely with consumer insights to use consumer segmentation and need states analysis to develop product and brand hypothesis for development and testing
Develop
• Work closely with agency partners through idea and concept development, through testing and optimization, and final launch execution
• Utilize research, and competitive, category, consumer, shopper, and retailer insights to further validate and optimize concepts to meet strategic objectives
• Work closely with winemaking, procurement and project managers to brief for new liquids/packaging, establish benchmarks and guardrails, and manage liquid/package development to meet project and timeline requirements
• Shepherd project by managing milestone delivery, P&L hurdles, and volume forecasts
• Manage project budgets; ensure allocation of budgets across initiatives are spent in efficient and effective ways; responsible for managing monthly budget reporting and forecasting
• Assist in development of best-in-class innovation practices and processes
• Collaborate with cross-functional partners

Minimum Qualifications
• Bachelor’s degree required
• Minimum 3 years’ experience in Brand Management/Marketing Management position in consumer product company required
• Experience with syndicated data
• Able to build out power point that tell a story with data
• Direct and Brand Marketing experience
Proven desire and ability to think creatively coupled with strong analytical skills
• Excellent communication skills; very articulate, strong public speaking and writing skills
• Excellent project management and organizational skills, solid financial acumen and an attention to detail
• Strong teamwork skills; ability to take ownership of projects and work with interdepartmental functions to achieve project completion in a smooth and timely manner
• Strong PC skills (Windows, Word, Excel, PowerPoint)
• Successful candidate will be a very motivated self-starter and be able to work without daily guidance
• Ability to work successfully in a fast-paced, high-energy environment

Preferred Qualifications
• MBA preferred
• CPG or Alcohol Beverage industry experience preferred
• Experience with 3-tier distribution system a plus
• Experience in packaging and creative development
• Syndicated database experience (IRI or Nielsen) a plus

Role of the Brand AmbassadorWe call our Aeropostale team members Brand Ambassadors because they promote the culture, values and mission of Aeropostale. If you are outgoing, friendly and have a passion for fashion, this is a perfect role for you. As a Brand Ambassador, your number one job is to share your love of fashion and do whatever it takes to create an amazing shopping experience for our customers.Our Mission: A store where customers love to shop and employees want to work!Who you are:* Outgoing and excited to meet new people* Positive, charismatic and engaging* Obsessed with fashion and trends* Fantastic sense of style* Thoughtful with a desire to make others feel good about themselves and their individual styleWhat you'll do:* Engage, educate and befriend customers to make an amazing shopping experience* Achieve and exceed sales goals by utilizing our selling strategy* Show understanding of customer's personal style when offering fashion advice* Inspire customers with your knowledge of fashion and trends and help them build perfect outfits* Assist with daily opening and closing tasks to maintain a clean, neat and today store* Complete all job responsibilities such as floorsets, filling the floor, ringing customers, etc. as directed* Remain positive and professional and work together with the team to make a great environment for our customers and each other* Be a role model for our values of respect, integrity, teamwork, compassion and accountabilityWhat you'll need:* Outgoing personality* Love of fashion* Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and multi-task* Flexible availability to meet the needs of the business (including evenings and weekends)* Commitment to arrive for scheduled shifts on time and maintain consistent attendance* Able to meet the physical requirements of the job (standing/walking up to 95% of the time, lifting or moving up to 25 pounds, bend, twist and kneel to complete tasks)Where you come from:* You are at least 16 years of age* Interview Requirement: One group interview (preferred) OR a one-on-one interview with Store ManagerAero OpCo LLC is an equal opportunity employer. As a Brand Ambassador, your number one job is to share your love of fashion and do whatever it takes to create an amazing shopping experience for our customers.Our Mission: A store where customers love to shop and employees want to work!Who you are:* Outgoing and excited to meet new people* Positive, charismatic and engaging* Obsessed with fashion and trends* Fantastic sense of style* Thoughtful with a desire to make others feel good about themselves and their individual styleWhat you'll do:* Engage, educate and befriend customers to make an amazing shopping experience* Achieve and exceed sales goals by utilizing our selling strategy* Show understanding of customer's personal style when offering fashion advice* Inspire customers with your knowledge of fashion and trends and help them build perfect outfits* Assist with daily opening and closing tasks to maintain a clean, neat and today store* Complete all job responsibilities such as floorsets, filling the floor, ringing customers, etc. as directed* Remain positive and professional and work together with the team to make a great environment for our customers and each other* Be a role model for our values of respect, integrity, teamwork, compassion and accountabilityWhat you'll need:* Outgoing personality* Love of fashion* Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and multi-task* Flexible availability to meet the needs of the business (including evenings and weekends)* Commitment to arrive for scheduled shifts on time and maintain consistent attendance* Able to meet the physical requirements of the job (standing/walking up to 95% of the time, lifting or moving up to 25 pounds, bend, twist and kneel to complete tasks)Where you come from:* You are at least 16 years of age* Interview Requirement: One group interview (preferred) OR a one-on-one interview with Store ManagerAero OpCo LLC is an equal opportunity employer. We value a culture a culture of inclusion and diversity within our workforce, and are committed to maintaining a workplace free from prohibited employment conduct, including discrimination or harassment on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, age, religion, disability, genetic information, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, marital status, domestic partner status, civil partnership, status as a covered veteran, status in the Uniformed Services of the United States, citizenship and any other characteristic protected by law ("Protected Characteristics").

Job Description

Brand Evangelist Summary

Lakanto, one of the fastest growing Natural Food Companies, is looking for upbeat individuals to join our Team. Lakanto Brand Evangelists are heavily relied on to drive sales and bring the brand to life. You will actively educate on the benefits of Lakanto MonkFruit Sweetened products and create positive brand experiences.

If you are a resourceful and reliable self-starter who loves engaging with people then this is the job for you! This is a field-based, contract-based role that will be ever-changing and exciting.

Position Responsibilities:
Grass roots promoters
Well connected and charismatic
Expert in a related brand or field
Not a must have to have social followings
You will be a spokesperson for Lakanto
We want you to wear your ambassadorship loudly and proudly across all channels
Attend and/or help run events
Position Requirements:
Passion for Lakanto
Previous Ambassador, influencer, or affiliate experience preferred
Excited about life and health!
An itch to help spread the "Discover your Chi" movement!
Lakanto Summary

Lakanto is a fast-paced company that is a subsidiary of Saraya Worldwide, a Fortune 500 company in Japan.

We are a startup that is looking for people that are hungry and eager to build and grow. We are looking for people that are passionate, driven, clever, and can resonate with our core values.

Our Core Values
Focused Discipline
Speed is the New Currency
Do More with Less
Master Sherpas Needed
Be Agile & Adaptable
80/20 Rule
We Over-Communicate
We Innovate
Create a Movement
Be the Category King
Mission

Our mission is to bring Chi to Life. We do this by inspiring people to reach their highest

potential in health and wellness and creating products that are innovative, delicious,

natural, sugar-free, and healthy.

THE PERKS AND BENEFITS
Free Product
Lakanto Swag
Working with an awesome team

Event Show Demonstrator / Brand Ambassador

LA Carpet is Californias best choice for everything you need for your home building, renovation and remodeling project. For over 30 years weve provided individual care, premium products, and high-quality services to our customers in the Orange, Riverside and LA Counties market.

As part of our team you will contribute by introducing customers to our remodeling services. You will be attending events weekly and talking to prospective customers about our product line.

As an Event Show Demonstrator / Brand Ambassador you will be expected to obtain and track consumer information. A very important part of this position is to create a positive experience for the customer by presenting our products in a cheerful and welcoming manner. This is a position with an hourly pay structure.

Attributes to be successful:

Experience in lead generation at events
Ability to sell in a cheerful and friendly matter, speak with others, actively listen and assess their needs. How can we help them??
You will be calling and following up with leads you generated at the events. You need to be okay with calling people after 5pm during the week.
A valid drivers license and reliable vehicle
A customer comes first attitude; give them your full attention
Must be available to work weekends and extended house per day or per week.
Take down information correctly and quickly.
Plan and coordinate events and educational activities from the conception, set-up to tear-down with the direction of the Marketing & Communications Director.
Travel to and support onsite execution of key events, including show load-in and load out
Data Entry of leads received from each event and these are added in timely manner
Manage all the event photos and distribution with our internal/external team
What makes an amazing lead generator?
Enthusiasm about the product
An outgoing personality
Ability to stand for periods of 4 - 5 hours
Transportation to and from events (this would require having a car or using public transportation)
Punctuality
Strong project management, customer service and relationship building skills
Effective written and verbal communication, able to deliver clear, concise information tailored to specific and varied audiences
Exceptionally detail-oriented and organized, ensuring quality and consistent output, ensuring accurate information for internal and external stakeholders
Ability to effectively solve problems, think creatively, make decisions and take action, exercising independent judgment
Ability to maintain a professional and positive attitude and work independently with little guidance
If you have these qualities, we want to meet you NOW!

Our shows are all over Orange, Riverside, and LA Counties. Because our territory is so large, it is crucial that you have access to reliable transportation.

We offer a very competitive compensation plan!

Powered by JazzHR

Pilgrim’s is the second largest chicken producer in the world, with operations in the U.S., Puerto Rico, Mexico and the U.K. Pilgrim’s processes, prepares, packages and delivers fresh, further-processed and value-added poultry products for sale to customers in more than 100 countries, employs more than 50,000 people and contracts with more than 5,200 family farmers. Pilgrim’s is headquartered in beautiful Greeley, Colorado, at the JBS USA corporate office where our 1,200 employees enjoy more than 300 days of sunshine a year.

The Pilgrim’s Retail team is seeking an experienced Marketing Brand Manager for a role at our headquarters in Greeley, CO. The Brand Manager is responsible for managing and executing brand plans on products sold in Retail and Club Channels. Candidate must have brand/product management experience. Reporting to the Director of Brand Marketing, with a focus on a designated retail brands and categories, you will be our Marketing expert. Responsible for growing meaningful consumer brands through planning and executing consumer and customer promotions to drive brand awareness and generate demand.

RESPONSIBILITIES:

Support Pilgrim’s Business Units and Sales team by:
Creating demand for our retail brands & products to drive profitable top-line sales
Identifying white-space growth opportunities
Developing sell-in decks for the Sales team to attain new distribution of our retail brands
Strategic brand planning – develop and gain approval of retail brand marketing objectives, goals, strategies and KPI’s

Recommend annual retail brand marketing plans & calendar
Recommended budget, budget allocation, align BU’s and gain approval
Recommend and gain approval of marketing mix, tactics
Execute retail brand marketing tactics to deliver objectives, goals, strategies & plan
Invest & manage retail brand marketing budget - media, promotions, events
Manage agencies and suppliers to create business building advertising
Measure and report effectiveness of our retail brand marketing investment & impact of the “marketing levers” via monthly and annual business reviews
Measure Marketing ROI
Monitor in-market results ($, Volume, shipments)
Responsible for assessing the business environment, competitors, customers, market trends, and implications to the business and making recommendations.
Understand how key drivers are impacting business results
Report results, recommend actions and gain approval of actions, based on in-market results and key drivers to grow business / close gaps
Gather and analyze data to identify insights and translate into business initiatives and actionable tasks to improve business results.
Adjust marketing tactics to capture the opportunities and close gaps
Continuous improvement of day to day retail brand marketing and category activities.
Help junior team members develop in these areas.

Identify white space growth opportunities and develop plans to attain new distribution
Build retail brand success stories and sales presentations to facilitate distribution in new retail customers
Supports Sales on key meetings & presentations for customer sell-in process by creating critical sales sell-in presentations.
Build a strong contact network across Business Units, Innovation, Sales, and cross functional category teams

QUALIFICATIONS:
Bachelor's Degree required
7-9 years relevant CPG experience in Brand and/or Product Management and Innovation, including P&L management
Microsoft Office applications with advanced skills in PowerPoint, Excel and Word
Excellent verbal and written communication skills
Proven cross-functional leading and strategic influencing
Ability to analyze syndicated data and provide insights (Nielsen, IRI, etc.)
Demonstrated bias for action and ability to manage projects independently from start to finish
Ability to thrive in an entrepreneurial, fast-paced environment
Retail perishable meat experience preferred but not required
EOE/M/F/Disabled/Vet

We have an immediate position available for a bold, dynamic individual to assist with the implementation of various promotional campaigns on behalf of our expanding roster of brands that we represent. This position is best fit for an ambitious, natural born leader with an unrelenting work ethic.

Hard work pays off in our firm. With the addition of several new clients from diverse industries this year, opportunities to ascend through the ranks and make waves are there for the taking.

We steadfastly believe in equipping our team members with a multifaceted training experience starting with the mastery of these key areas:
Direct Marketing
Fundamental Sales
Promotional Events
Consumer Services
Customer Acquisition
Business Development
Inventory Analysis and Management
Campaign Development
Training and Talent Development
Leadership and Management
Requirements:
0 - 3 years of experience in hospitality or related field
Must be 18 years of age or older
Proficient interpersonal communication skills
Approachable and affable
Vigorous work ethic and sense of urgency
Ability to make quick judgement calls
Efficient under pressure and when prioritizing
Consistently maintains professionalism and integrity
Salary: $36,500.00 to $54,600.00 /year

Brand Ambassador (Event & Show Demonstrator)

With more than 25 years in business, Bath Planet is one of the fastest growing brands in the acrylic bath remodeling industry. We offer custom bath remodeling that enriches the lives of those we touch with bathrooms that are attractive, durable and maintenance-free.

We are seeking Brand Ambassadors/Event Demonstrators for our Marietta, Georgia markets and surrounding areas to join our winning team. Customer service experience is a plus, as you will be interacting with event attendees, discussing our product and securing sales leads for our team. Hourly pay + bonus based on quality appointments.

Essential Duties
Attract visitors and staff booth at shows and events
Promote product and provide basic product overviews to attendees
Book appointments
Specific Responsibilities of the Job
Maintain a professional appearance throughout event
Ensure cleanliness and organization of booth
Engage with passers-by to draw them into the booth
Explain basic product features and benefits
Secure entry forms or book in home sales appointments
Collect daily leads and provide to Event Coordinator
Knowledge & Skill
Strong communications skills
Positive, outgoing personality
Ability to work in a fast-paced environment
Physical Demands
Travel to booked shows/events (must have reliable transportation)
Ability to stand for long periods of time
Ability to lift 30 pounds
Available to work weekends
Powered by JazzHR

Job Description

Brand Evangelist Summary

Lakanto, one of the fastest growing Natural Food Companies, is looking for upbeat individuals to join our Team. Lakanto Brand Evangelists are heavily relied on to drive sales and bring the brand to life. You will actively educate on the benefits of Lakanto MonkFruit Sweetened products and create positive brand experiences.

If you are a resourceful and reliable self-starter who loves engaging with people then this is the job for you! This is a field-based, contract-based role that will be ever-changing and exciting.

Position Responsibilities:
Grass roots promoters
Well connected and charismatic
Expert in a related brand or field
Not a must have to have social followings
You will be a spokesperson for Lakanto
We want you to wear your ambassadorship loudly and proudly across all channels
Attend and/or help run events
Position Requirements:
Passion for Lakanto
Previous Ambassador, influencer, or affiliate experience preferred
Excited about life and health!
An itch to help spread the "Discover your Chi" movement!
Lakanto Summary

Lakanto is a fast-paced company that is a subsidiary of Saraya Worldwide, a Fortune 500 company in Japan.

We are a startup that is looking for people that are hungry and eager to build and grow. We are looking for people that are passionate, driven, clever, and can resonate with our core values.

Our Core Values
Focused Discipline
Speed is the New Currency
Do More with Less
Master Sherpas Needed
Be Agile & Adaptable
80/20 Rule
We Over-Communicate
We Innovate
Create a Movement
Be the Category King
Mission

Our mission is to bring Chi to Life. We do this by inspiring people to reach their highest

potential in health and wellness and creating products that are innovative, delicious,

natural, sugar-free, and healthy.

THE PERKS AND BENEFITS
Free Product
Lakanto Swag
Working with an awesome team

Job Title: Brand Ambassador - Aeropostale Vintage Faire Mall
Job Description: Role of the Brand AmbassadorWe call our Aeropostale team members Brand Ambassadors because they promote the culture, values and mission of Aeropostale. If you are outgoing, friendly and have a passion for fashion, this is a perfect role for you. As a Brand Ambassador, your number one job is to share your love of fashion and do whatever it takes to create an amazing shopping experience for our customers.Our Mission: A store where customers love to shop and employees want to work!Who you are:* Outgoing and excited to meet new people* Positive, charismatic and engaging* Obsessed with fashion and trends* Fantastic sense of style* Thoughtful with a desire to make others feel good about themselves and their individual styleWhat you'll do:* Engage, educate and befriend customers to make an amazing shopping experience* Achieve and exceed sales goals by utilizing our selling strategy* Show understanding of customer's personal style when offering fashion advice* Inspire customers with your knowledge of fashion and trends and help them build perfect outfits* Assist with daily opening and closing tasks to maintain a clean, neat and today store* Complete all job responsibilities such as floorsets, filling the floor, ringing customers, etc. as directed* Remain positive and professional and work together with the team to make a great environment for our customers and each other* Be a role model for our values of respect, integrity, teamwork, compassion and accountabilityWhat you'll need:* Outgoing personality* Love of fashion* Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and multi-task* Flexible availability to meet the needs of the business (including evenings and weekends)* Commitment to arrive for scheduled shifts on time and maintain consistent attendance* Able to meet the physical requirements of the job (standing/walking up to 95% of the time, lifting or moving up to 25 pounds, bend, twist and kneel to complete tasks)Where you come from:* You are at least 16 years of age* Interview Requirement: One group interview (preferred) OR a one-on-one interview with Store ManagerSPARC Group LLC is an equal opportunity employer. As a Brand Ambassador, your number one job is to share your love of fashion and do whatever it takes to create an amazing shopping experience for our customers.Our Mission: A store where customers love to shop and employees want to work!Who you are:* Outgoing and excited to meet new people* Positive, charismatic and engaging* Obsessed with fashion and trends* Fantastic sense of style* Thoughtful with a desire to make others feel good about themselves and their individual styleWhat you'll do:* Engage, educate and befriend customers to make an amazing shopping experience* Achieve and exceed sales goals by utilizing our selling strategy* Show understanding of customer's personal style when offering fashion advice* Inspire customers with your knowledge of fashion and trends and help them build perfect outfits* Assist with daily opening and closing tasks to maintain a clean, neat and today store* Complete all job responsibilities such as floorsets, filling the floor, ringing customers, etc. as directed* Remain positive and professional and work together with the team to make a great environment for our customers and each other* Be a role model for our values of respect, integrity, teamwork, compassion and accountabilityWhat you'll need:* Outgoing personality* Love of fashion* Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and multi-task* Flexible availability to meet the needs of the business (including evenings and weekends)* Commitment to arrive for scheduled shifts on time and maintain consistent attendance* Able to meet the physical requirements of the job (standing/walking up to 95% of the time, lifting or moving up to 25 pounds, bend, twist and kneel to complete tasks)Where you come from:* You are at least 16 years of age* Interview Requirement: One group interview (preferred) OR a one-on-one interview with Store ManagerAero OpCo LLC is an equal opportunity employer. We value a culture a culture of inclusion and diversity within our workforce, and are committed to maintaining a workplace free from prohibited employment conduct, including discrimination or harassment on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, age, religion, disability, genetic information, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, marital status, domestic partner status, civil partnership, status as a covered veteran, status in the Uniformed Services of the United States, citizenship and any other characteristic protected by law ("Protected Characteristics").

As a Brand Ambassador, your number one job is to share your love of fashion and do whatever it takes to create an amazing shopping experience for our customers.Our Mission: A store where customers love to shop and employees want to work!Who you are:* Outgoing and excited to meet new people* Positive, charismatic and engaging* Obsessed with fashion and trends* Fantastic sense of style* Thoughtful with a desire to make others feel good about themselves and their individual styleWhat you'll do:* Engage, educate and befriend customers to make an amazing shopping experience* Achieve and exceed sales goals by utilizing our selling strategy* Show understanding of customer's personal style when offering fashion advice* Inspire customers with your knowledge of fashion and trends and help them build perfect outfits* Assist with daily opening and closing tasks to maintain a clean, neat and today store* Complete all job responsibilities such as floorsets, filling the floor, ringing customers, etc. as directed* Remain positive and professional and work together with the team to make a great environment for our customers and each other* Be a role model for our values of respect, integrity, teamwork, compassion and accountabilityWhat you'll need:* Outgoing personality* Love of fashion* Ability to work in a fast-paced environment and multi-task* Flexible availability to meet the needs of the business (including evenings and weekends)* Commitment to arrive for scheduled shifts on time and maintain consistent attendance* Able to meet the physical requirements of the job (standing/walking up to 95% of the time, lifting or moving up to 25 pounds, bend, twist and kneel to complete tasks)Where you come from:* You are at least 16 years of age* Interview Requirement: One group interview (preferred) OR a one-on-one interview with Store ManagerAero OpCo LLC is an equal opportunity employer. We value a culture a culture of inclusion and diversity within our workforce, and are committed to maintaining a workplace free from prohibited employment conduct, including discrimination or harassment on the basis of race, color, national origin, sex, age, religion, disability, genetic information, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, marital status, domestic partner status, civil partnership, status as a covered veteran, status in the Uniformed Services of the United States, citizenship and any other characteristic protected by law ("Protected Characteristics").
